intro: Psychrogeton rotundifolius, commonly known as the round-leaved psychrogeton, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its rounded, palmate leaves and small, clustered white or yellow flowers. This species is typically found in temperate regions, often in moist, shaded environments. The plant has a compact growth habit and is sometimes cultivated for its ornamental value. Its botanical features make it a distinctive member of the carrot family.
